values:
Long time no talk.  What a crazy first week off of school.  On Saturday my grandpa passed away.  It was probably one of the hardest things I have ever had to deal with.  I was closer to him than my grandma that passed away so that made it even more difficult.  I love him and will always love my grandpa.  I had some support from my friends and for that I thank you, but I wish my friends were a little more there for me...oh well, what are you gonna do...it's really about your family anyways. 
    Little girls cheer camp coming up, I'm excited, but i'm sick. Tomorrow is tuesday (i've been writing this entry over time) and I hope i am better by tomorrow!  So i can back to doing what I love. lol.

Lets just say i am confused about lots of stuff right now.  But i love everyone of my girls and guys!

<3 Candace

Welps, only two barely half days left.  wOwZeRz I am almost a senior.  I am still in shock! no! I'm just a baby! I can't go to college in a year.  Yeah, that one should be interesting.  
Finals haven't been all so bad, just kinda long and annoying most of the time, u are just like, ENOUGH ALREADY. 
Today at work we sabatoged Nick's Cobalt.  We put a cup of ketchup on his seat and Julia decided to spell poop on the hood out of bread pieces.  OH JULIA.  Then I put stacks of bread on his antenna with one right on top.  It was pretty funny, harmless to his car too.  SO, no big deal.  I really got a true laugh out of that one.  I love Nick.
Friday is a party at Jims, juniors and sophs I guess, hoping to stay the night at Hannah's after...SCHOOLS OUT NEWAYS!
Welp, give me some end of the year comments babes! Somethin to remember this year by.


<3 Can

Well, this is the last public entry I am gonna post, because people who get joy out of tattling on me are sick.  I guess it's my fault for making it public in the first place.  
Tomorrow starts finals and the very LAST WEEK of school.  I am very excited about that.  I am so sick and tired of school.  I can't believe I am gonna be a senior next year.  That's absolutely crazy if ya ask me.  I am still an itty bitty freshman!  Well, what do you know?  these years just fly by.  It should be a pretty nice summer.  I am thinkin thats bout right.  
I am getting pretty sick of people who act like their lives are either pretty awful when the whole world and the moon are in love with them and worship at their feet, or they are the center of attention.  How could anyone possibly whine so much and have so much at the same time, and don't u realize that you don't have to be the center of attention.  It's like, be thankful for what you've got and treat people with some respect man.  I think being fake stinks lots.  I am just happy that I realize the difference.  
I just wanna say that I love the people who are so amazing to me and always there for me.  You just dont get that often enough and that makes me even more thankful for it.  I love you guys so much!!!!!

Good luck studying for finals everyone!

<3 Can

Well, Cheer's over and we have 14 on varsity!   it's the biggest squad we've ever had...its gonna be really awesome tho...cool cheers and cool stunts baby!  It should be a fun year.  Oh  yeah...liz and I made captain too! I'm really happy i'm captain with her, we'll work well together.  I am not gonna be cruel or crazy, I know that just hurts a team...I'm just ready to work it out (work it out) lol.  I'm excited.  Congrats to the 05 Varsity team.  Liz, Erica, Kaitlyn, Lindsay, Rachel, Kristina, Lauren, Lenore, Vicky, Ashlee, Kat, Hannah, May May!  I <3 you guys!  Get ready for Cheer 05 baby! 

Mike got off grounding, yay mike, finally!  

Studying TONS for finals this weekend...wish me LUCK!

Hannah hates me. i don't know why shes being like this : (

<3 Candace

What a long week!  It's seemed to drag on forever...thank goodness tomorrow is friday, that means its getting really close to school getting out.  I can't wait for summer...it's gonna be amazing.  I was watching the One Tree Hill finale and I was like, oh wow I really can't wait, because I saw how they were acting and I was like, you just can't be that happy when ur in school at LHWL caged up like a little monkey!  Finals are gonna be a biotch, especially math.  And I need like an 81%.  Ugh lets hope and pray.  Cheerleading cuts are today, so that means the week is over and now we go to just every wednsday practices at open gym.  I can't wait for stunt and tumble camp its gonna be tight.  Hannah, Liz, Erica, and I put up a pretty solid elevator to extension yesterday, so there's one solid stunt for us.  I am excited about that!  I think I have a pretty good idea of who's gonna make varsity, but there is still some iffys, and some that think they can make comments and be in charge when they have to wait their turn....nazi.  anyways, lets just hope it all works out.  Well, this weekend will be a nice break, having monday off and all.  Hope I get to do what I wanna do!
*Hugs and kisses*
<3 Can

I kinda feel this sentiment that the team isn't gonna be as happy as I want.  I just want everyone to go away every day feeling like this is everyone's team, not just one or two peoples'.  I don't want this to be divided, or "buddy buddy" we aren't there to make fun of each other or be mean to each other...we are there to love each other and act like a team who's there to cheer.  Let's try and make it that way.  Last season worked great.  I just want it to be that way again.  Don't repeat former mistakes!


I <3 my cheerleaders


<3 Can

Well this week should be pretty hectic.  Its CHEEEEEER TIME BABY!  I am so excited, I've been waiting (in case you didn't already know).  Plus, its student council elections week!  All I gotta say is you better vote KAYLA and CANDACE, cuz we're ready to do an awesome job! I promise ;).  We've got you covered!  I am just glad this is all goin on though, cuz it will make the whole week go by a lot faster, bringing nearer the END OF SCHOOL!!! I just can't wait.  But ugh finals first...my FAV!  Just a really high note, i turn in my AP book tomorrow! aka....I wish I could burn it for some clarity.  

ANYWAYS this weeks gonna be TIGHT cuz its CHEER TIME biotches--and I couldn't be more HAPPY! Get ready cuz this year we're goin ALLLLLLL THE WAYYYYYYY!  I love my cheer girls, Hannah, Linz, Erica(forever joined at the hip, spot and flyer), Liz, Kaitlyn, Rachie, K-Tina....ETC   Are you ready for this! HELLS YA!


<3 Can

Well, today's just another day!  to tell you the truth, I am getting super sick of school!  Cheerleading starts next monday and I am sooo excited.  Its gonna be an awesome senior year if ya ask me!  Tomorrow is Special Olympics day for NHS, that should be interesting.  I am kinda nervous actually.  Oh well, we'll all be together.  Gotta work tonight and tomorrow, but only for like an hour cuz I am going to my brother's play.  He's got a solo part, so that should be a riot.  Mike got grounded for two weeks.  Good job Mike, I hate you! jk.  Today we have like 1/2 hour classes due to an assembly at the end of the day and its SWWAAEET.  Well, x's and o's

I'm a blonde for life.
Those who can't blonde, brunette.  Right Laura?


<3 Can

What's up with everyone?  Hope you're all doin okay! I know that everything's a little confusy for my right now...oh wait, when is it not?  Let's just say I have a big decision ahead of me to put it lightly...not really a whole lot of stuff I can talk about tho cuz people have big () mouths.  This weekend was my brother's birthday and we went to the arcade and out to Red Robin's for dinner.  It was good stuff.  He got DDR for his birthday + some cool clothes from me (of course).  I have him looking snazzy.  I can't believe school gets out on the 3rd, aka like 2 weeks holy crap. I mean thank goodness I am so sick of it.  I wish I was a senior going off to college.  Ugh I am so tired today cuz I have to get up at 5 30, to get here at 6 30 because I forgot my history book this weekend and I still turned it a crappy set of notes, prolly getting me like a 10/15.  Gosh I can't wait for summer.  Yeah so hopes to hang out with my Kamraths this weekend because I miss them.  U just can't go too long without your LO and Blonde for life.  okay, I am outie.


Oh yeah, found out this weekend Mike's like, rich, way to be rich and have ur father have like 100 emmys Mike...way to go!

Hugs and Kisses

<3 Can

My AP test was ok, not as bad as I thought, I prolly still didnt pull a three, but atleast I tried, I am so glad its over!!!!!!!!

Last night was prom and it was pretty fun.  The food was okay, the music was good, and everyone looked adorable in their dresses.  By the end of the night I was pretty beat, however, and I decided not to go to Nick's house after, and just go home.  Plus, I had a bad ending to the night with Rob.  I knew it was gonna have to be this way though.  You just can't get around it when you're trying to move on.  I didnt wake up till 11:30 this morning and that was only on account that adam called me.  I just picked up the phone and hung up everyone of the three times he called.  Damnit Adam, didnt you know i had prom last night?  Anyways, I had fun last night with Hannah and all my junior friends as well as Laura and Alyssa.  Everyone looked so pretty! Can't wait to get pics developed.

Keep praying for all my friends going through deaths right now, especially rachel and natalie.


<3 Can

Hey, how's it goin?

Finding it really hard right now to be excited for prom because a) Ap test is tomorrow and I am so sick of history/I know when I look at the test I am gonna be overwhelmed because I am gonna have to make up stuff cuz I wont know it.  No, its not the fact that I care what I get, I just dont wanna take a test for four hours, oh well, I'll do my best, wish me luck and b) recent findings out about a new guy by the date makes him oh so not happy.  Oh well, make the best out of it I guess is all you gotta do.

All I gotta say is that at 12 o clock tomorrow I am gonna be so happy because AP is finally gonna be basically over.  I am soo sicky icky icky of it!  

Listen to me complain while everyone is going through so much more, pray for the Sieloff's and the Sliva's who have both lost a grandparent.  Pray for Mr.Sliva who is still recovering and hurting.  Pray for my Nat to have strength.  Pray for my grandpa who was just recently released from the hospital and is struggling.  Lord, be with everyone who is hurting right now.


Share your kiss,

<3 Can

I just wanna say one thing--I love hannah, and she loves the DECENT man...wait till you see his bro---rawwr.  U a fly girl!


I love Natalie, pray for her Dad, he's such an awesome guy, best to your family baby!


Kayla feel better!



<3 Can

Welp, things been a little crazy lately.  Not for me, but around me.  All I gotta say is I'm a little sick being in the middle of a crazy situation.  All I know is that I love one of my friends very much and shes been there for me a million times, and I am not about to bad mouth her.  And I am sick and tired of hearing someone who doesn't even know her say lies about her that shes heard and I can't even tell her they're lies cuz she'll believe anything a certain person tells her cuz they're like BFF.  I just know its all crap and a bag of chips.  I don't understand why a person expects me to stand behind them when they've screwed me over so many times and I try to be so nice to them, letting them make fun of me to my face and not even talking back, listening to their tears, and yet still they have zero respect.  When did anyone think they were so much better than me to treat me like that?   All I know is none of its about me.  It sure isn't.  So I am gonna be friends with the ones who know how to be friends back.  I am NOT mad at anyone.  I just know that I never did ANYTHING wrong.


<3 Can

I've been sicky for a while, throat infection and congested chest.  It sucks!  I still feel sick and I wish I wasnt in school, but no such luck, I have to be as long as im not contagious, because I missed so many days during my "lesions in the intestine" period.  I had to disect my pig today too, smells YUMMAY and it really made my already upset stomach feel oh so much better, I must say!  Anyways, enough complaining about my sick self (haha).  Rob brought me flowers yesterday cuz I've had a rough couple days (not just being sick) and that was really nice I thought big hug for that one Rob, he's such a good friend!  Prom is still fast approaching, i'm pretty excited.  I wish it was the end of school right now, I would much rather be at work.  Well, I gots lots of homework to catch up on, as usual.  Wish me luck!


<3 Can

What it is ho?
It's been a while since i've ^dated.  Nothing too exciting going on.  Just took my ACTs last saturday, english and math were easy, science and reading not so much.  They weren't horrid I guess tho.  I dunno what I got.  I dont think I did really bad though, by not super good either.  Oh well, I guess we will see.  I am taking them again in June neways.  Proms not too long away...I am pretty happy, I love my dress and all, it should be fun, I am sitting at a table with linz, em, rach, and all our dates.  I'm sure all my girls will look gorgeous!  Also, Sam's bringing Nick from work.  He's a cool guy, so that should be fun. Rob's Grandpa's memorial is tomorrow.  Poor Rob, its gotta be so hard, I don't know what I'll do when my grandpa dies.  God Bless their family.  
   Yesterday Me and Kate (ps--she's got a new boyfriend who she met at Mickey D's!!) went and orded the SADD shirts...so those will be cool.
   Tomorrow's Nat's b-day party.  WELL WE ALL KNOW THATS GONNA SUCK...just kidding! I <3 Nat...its gonna be CRRRRAaaazzzZZZy haha.  Crap, I have to get my taxes in.  
Oh yeah, (this ones for you big H)-- Hannah and I are going tanning Saturday Mizzorning.

Pray for my grandpa...he's in the hospital with pneumonia...I hope he'll be ok..I love you Grandpa...


<3 Candace

I guess updating is pretty pointless right now, but might as well.  I just have been working constantly and its crazy!  Racking up the $$ tho.  I havent really gotten to hang out with a lot of people except adam and kay.  I love my Kay lol.  Tomorrow I might hang out with her, or maybe brad if she can't, just for something to do I supposes.  I miss my Kamrath sisters a lot tho.  I can't wait till they come back!  Neways...I am out for now, tired as usual.

xoxo

<3 Can

Partys are awesome.  That's all I gotta say about that.  I love my Kay...shes awesome too.  Thanks for everything baby.  I love all my friends.  Call me up all of you I havent hung out with, cuz I miss you for real. I have to work double shifts like all this week, omg, what a break. Tired as hell right now I am going to bed!


xoxo
<3 Can

Today I went to court.  That was tight because I talked to this officer guy and he said he decided to dismiss the ticket because I am a good child.  Who knew? i am so crazy!  haha!  that was tight tho, no points and no $ I love my Uncle Don who's a cop and totally saved my ass on this one.  Holla Uncle Donny.  He totally gets a free babysitting night for his four boys for that one.  NEWAYS...tonight I am going to highlight Jake's/possibly Sam's hair if there's dye left over.  That should be fun, I love jakey....hes gonna look so sexy.  Going up to work for a little first to wait for jake to get out of his parent meeting for baseball.  And just because Alex is so amazing, I decided that he could take 3 minutes of his life reading this to now know that I love him oh so very much, and am starting to not hate him as much as I did in the recent past!  Love ya ali!


xoxo

<3 Can

Yeah,
so what's up?  eh not so much I suppose.  Had to work today again, it was fun, me and kayla were being crazy, we're going to nick's party next thursday then having a SLEEP OVA, that is, if she wants me, which I am still not sure about (haha).  It's a work party...so it should be okay, except for Bree (she works at my place) she and Nick are always like attached at the hip and I think they wanna get it on.  But everyone is always like...omg I hate them together they are so annoying! I kinda agree they are kinda annoying cuz its like this never ending flirt fest...yuckie...but its tight cuz they are meant for each other kinda...body and body and no brains with no brains (if ya know what I'm sayin).  I guess Nick's cute, but hes a TOTAL metro.  wow, he shaves his arms...hes a guy for gosh sakes.  If he shaves his armpits/legs i refuse to talk to him nemore.  But anyways, she'll prolly be there so they'll be off in another room. Haha. Other than that, the party should be fun, with my Kay...everyone will prolly be drunk so that will be funny as hail too.  Yeah working a lot lately, but its tight cuz now I finally have some spendin $ and don't have to beg my momma for gas $.  lol.  welpers, out for now...


xoxo
<3 Can

Today I bought a prom dress.  It's really pretty, and it was my first choice.  I found another one I liked even more that was peach, but it was too big and there wasnt a smaller size.  Uck, it was so pretty. Oh well, it was $220 anyways.  This one is really pretty too.  Guess I am gonna go up to work for a little bit and visit with Jake/show Debbie my dress (she loves that kind of stuff).  Then hang out with someone (adam wants to, or maybe frusti), but for real I am just tired and should really get my AP done because I have to work tomorrow.  Oh AP on a saturday, look what its done to me!

More lAtA

<3 Can

Today is not such an amazing day... I'm grounded now b/c of my grades. They arent horrible, just not up to par with my normal.  I know that really only semester grades count, so I should be able to bring this quarter up to even them out. It's just not that easy sometimes tho.  I also missed that whole week and a bunch of classes here and there when I was having my health problems.  That killed me in a lot of places.  I just really wish that last quarter I wasnt so busy so I could have had time to concentrate on things more.  But now I do have time to do that...so I am gonna.  I studied really well for my AP test last night, and I'm crossing my fingers.  I should be okay.  Nevertheless, now I cant watch TV, go on the internet, or (I am guessing although it was not stated), that I cant go out either.  But in some ways I think I deserve it.  I know that I can get better grades, I'm sure of it.  I can be lazy, and I can be irresponsible, but now I am trying to change that.  Well, love you all!

__x/x/x/x/x|o|o|o|o|__


<3 Can

So I've worked tues weds, I work tonight, and tomorrow night, and prolly sat and sun.  Its alot, but I am still okay with it cuz its a lot of money for me.  Sam told my boss yesterday that I was complaining about working.  Well, I dont WANNA work all those days, but I am going to, and its okay with me because of the money and all, so I wish she wouldnt have done that.  But OH WELL.  Gotta love her.  This Friday we might have a cheer party, which will be fun.  Its so nice not having a sport after school right now, but I am still so tired from working.  I know this week i just worked a lot tho.  I am seriously okay with it tho.  I miss spending time with some of my friends alot, and I promise now that cheerleadings over (and spring breaks here).  You know who you are.

Well, more later,

<3 Can

Today was states and we ended up placing 15th out of 20 teams.  I just still am in awe that we made it this far.  No cheer team has ever gone.  We were expecting to get last, so we were pleasantly surprised.  I am so proud of everyone!  I love you guys, thank you for the best season I have possibly ever had.  I am SOOO excited for next year.  This has made this year all the more exciting and happy.  I love you Laura, Lyss, Lindsay, Erica, Liz, Kaitlyn, Kristina, Becc, Vickie, Lenore, Ashley, Sara, and Kat.  I will miss you SENIORS you're my girls.  

Soooo Tired right now!

Pray for the Parish's guys...they really need you.


<3 Can

So I twisted my ankle yesterday in practice and tomorrow is states.  I dont care if I'm hurt tho i'm still going to cheer through it "neva let my ladies down"  We're staying the night at a hotel tonight and then registering at 7 am the next morning. I am nervous/excited/in pain.  I am relieved that this is the last thing tho cuz my ankle hurts!!  NEWAYS...I'm gonna go study my ap now..!  Dani I miss you and I love you and next weekend we are hanging out!!!!



<3 Can

I guess some people aren't as excited as I thought they would be about going to states.  I mean, its kinda a once in a lifetime thing, is how I see it.  But thats okay, there are a few of us really excited and thats all I need.  Its this Sat at 9 at Saginaw Valley State University.  We are staying the night at a hotel probably because we don't wanna get up at 4:30 and drive to Saginaw.  Makes sense to me.  I just feel blessed to have this opportunity.  Mrs. Liggett was so ecstatic.  This has never happened to her before and she just can't believe it.  I am more happy for her than for the rest of us.  

However, there is still some stuff that is making me sad once in a while.  I just wish sometimes that things were different.  But right now, I am just too happy about cheerleading to have it be the center of my life.  

<3 Can

Okay, we're freaking going to STATES!  That's right you heard me! Cuz the winner of each region and any team that get 95% of their score gets to go, but not every team did that so the slots weren't all filled, so they calculated percentages and therefore we got 80% of Clawson's score (#1 in our region) and we get to GO!!! ahhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Everyone was freaking out today when I called them and told them and I was crying when Mrs.Liggett told me!  I can't even believe it! I dont even care if we get last, its still amazing!!!!!!!! 

<3 Can

Well, cheerleading's over now (not im my mind however, cuz u know me always ready for next year) I am hoping to have open gyms once a month or something as well as through the summer tho, cuz everyone already has new ideas for next year.  It's amazing how much that competition pumped us up.  But finally, I have the spring season off.  I like being busy, but I also love having a break once in a while too (and a nice paycheck every two weeks).  Hannah is still trying to figure out what my livejournal name means, but she never will, and I wont ever tell her.  Lets just say it has something to do with something that I wish I could take back. (she'll still never get it)  Speaking of that work thing, time for me to take a nap and do my AP before I go in at 5.  See ya!

<3 Can

Wow, today was our competiton.  Everything was going fine and dandy until rebecca fell and broke her arm...what are the odds.  I felt so bad for her I started balling, as did the rest of the team.  They rolled her away and she blew us a kiss.  However, we all had to suck it up.  We put our jv flyer in for Rebecca and she really stepped it up.  We had to take out a few extra elements that would have probably gave us a few more points, but it was okay with me.  We ended up nailing everything really well and I was so proud of everyone.  We still got 3rd (out of 5 teams) but I think its pretty good with a girl having a broken arm the day of.  I love all my girls so much and this will be a season I will never forget. Laura, Alyssa, and Lindsay I will miss you.  And to all the girls coming back next year, we got this.  Well, Good Night!


<3Can

Jake and Adam are coming over now, I don't really know why, but they are...and its cool.  Work was crazy tonight...sam was mad...I don't blame her, people were being so lazy! Paul and Greening came to visit tho and it was sweet, I love them.  Tomorrows the competition/craft show.  I am nervous to the max (aka Go BLUE!--cheerleaders) but hey, if we beat NW its alllll GOOD in the hood...haha.  Wow that sounded gay...neways...I'm out...

I love my cheerleaders--Erica, Liz, Laura, Lyss, Kaitlyn, Becca, Lindsay--good luck LADIEESS!


XOXO

Tomorrow's the competition! man on man, crazy, I have my "Mrs. Liggett" outfit on today...its salmon colored!  welp....I'm in yearbook, doing nothing as usual, and I have to work tonight, oh Lindsay's party is tomorrow but I can't go, because of the club + I am sorta grounded, oh well maybe I'll hang out with Danielle.  Religion class is next hour, big TEST comin up!!! Well, bells gonna ring...gotta go...


<3 Can

Our cheerleading competition is this Saturday...Omg I am really nervous...It may seem like not a big deal but I still can't help being nervous.  I wish that it would just be over...and I really wanna beat Northwest.  Ugh...well I have a TON of homework..oh junior year...I sound so negative...did I mention how blessed I was? I love all my friends!

<3 Can
